title: Intact Mine
description:
**Location:** To find an Intact Mine, walk toward the cliff east of the Demineur’s location to find a series of column-like rock formations you can leap across. Jump across the rock formations to reach the eastern clearing pictured above. While leaping, remember that Clair Obscur features a mantle mechanic, so you don’t need to land perfectly on each platform to advance. But if you fall at any point, you can return to the starting point by climbing up the handholds attached to the western rockface.

When you reach the eastern platform, turn to face southward, and you should be able to spot a purple-glowing item in the distance. Next, leap onto the elongated rock formation to your right, and walk to the southern end of the surface before jumping south again to land on a small ledge. Lastly, jump onto the cylinder-like rock formation to your left, and hop toward the purple-glowing item to collect an Intact Mine.

**Use:** Give to [Demineur (Nevron)](/?locationId=457670)

title: Glowing Rock Crystal I
description:
**Location:** On the lower level, turn to face north, and you should spot the first rock crystal glowing in the darkness.  Defeat or sneak around any enemies in the area and use a free aim shot to dislodge and retrieve the crystal

**Use:** Given to [Hexga (Nevron)](/?locationId=457676)

title: Glowing Rock Crystal II
description:
**Location:** Head northeast to travel toward the center of the cave, and you'll find large, stalagmite-like rock formations emerging from the ground. Wrap around the rock formations, and you'll find the second Glowing Rock Crystal hiding on the other side. Shoot it with a Free Aim shot, then pick up the purple-colored item.

**Use:** Given to [Hexga (Nevron)](/?locationId=457676)

title: Glowing Rock Crystal III
description:
**Location:** Head toward the eastern end of the cave, and you should spot a rock crystal near another rope. As you approach the rock crystal, a Rocher will pop out of the ground. With the Glowing Rock Crystal intertwined with this creature, you'll need to take him down to collect the final quest item.

**Use:** Given to [Hexga (Nevron)](/?locationId=457676)

title: Richard
description:
**How to Begin:** After Sophie joins the party during the Prologue in [Lumiere](/?locationId=448441), speak with the man in the red coat with the cane  standing close to the base of the statue, not far from the banner above the stage that says “Rejoignez L’Expedition”

**Quest Steps:**
- Agree to help Richard deliver the uniform to his son 
- Speak with Richard's son Jules at the Gommage - find the young boy in a red outfit, standing at the top of the steps that lead down to the dock with Maelle

**Rewards:**
- Crimson Uniform (Gustave outfit)

title: Jar (Nevron)
description:
**How to Begin:** Speak with the white Nevron called Jar near the Abandoned Expeditioner Camp rest point in [Spring Meadows](/?locationId=448436)  

**Quest Steps:**
- Continue down the path and pick up the [Resin](/?locationId=448804) from the barrel at the base of the rock  
- Return to Jar and give them the Resin
- Jar asks you to light their lamp - do so by shooting the lamp at the end of the staff with your ranged attack 
- Speak with Jar again to complete the quest  

**Rewards:**
- Healing Tint Shard
- Colour of Lumina x10 (Must kill Jar)
- Grandiose Chroma Catalyst x2 (Must kill Jar)

title: Demineur (Nevron)
description:
**How to Begin:** Speak with Demineur, found inside [Flying Waters](/?locationId=448438).  From Noco's Hut rest point, head northwest and through the circular, vase-like structure.   

**Quest Steps:**
- Examine Demineur, but do not attack them
- Traverse the platforming challenge and retrieve the [Intact Mine](/?locationId=458084)
- Return to Demineur and give them the Intact Mine

**Rewards:**
- [Deminerim (Lune)](/?locationId=448933) (level 3)
- Colour of Lumina x3 (Must kill Demineur) 
- Chroma Catalyst (Must kill Demineur)

title: Karatom
description:
**How to Begin:** Find and speak with this tiny Gestral, west through the alley from the Chief House inside the [Gestral Village](/?locationId=448439)   

**Quest Steps:**
- Gain access to [Esquie's Nest](/?locationId=448435) by progressing the main story
- Retrieve the Blue [Mushroom](/?locationId=449490) in [Esquie's Nest](/?locationId=448435) and give it to Karatom
- Defeat Karatom's Ultimate Sakapatate in battle! 

**Rewards:**
- Pure (Gustave outfit)
- Polished Chroma Catalyst x3
- Recoat

**Note:** This quest cannot be completed after Act II

title: Bourgeon (Nevron)
description:
**How to Begin:** Speak with the small Bourgeon inside [The Small Bourgeon](/?locationId=448574) location - found southeast beyond the Expedition 53 flag rest point   

**Quest Steps:**
- Locate and defeat any one of the fully-grown Bourgeon optional bosses found throughout The Continent:
  - [Bourgeon](/?locationId=449460) (this one is easiest)
  - [Bourgeon](/?locationId=448512)
  - [Bourgeon](/?locationId=448531)
  - [Bourgeon](/?locationId=448554)
  - [Bourgeon](/?locationId=448611)
- Bring the dropped Bourgeon Skin back to the small Bourgeon 

**Rewards:**
- Colour of Lumina 
- Colour of Lumina x5 (Must kill the Grown Bourgeon)
- Polished Chroma Catalyst (Must kill the Grown Bourgeon)

title: Alexsoundro
description:
**How to Begin:** Speak with Alexsoundro, a tall and lanky Gestral standing near the lone column between the giant Sakapatate and the jousting area inside of the [Gestral Village](/?locationId=448439)  

**Quest Steps:**
- Agree to rescue Alexsoundro's patate 
- Head north toward the Arena 
- Take an immediate right to march down the southeastern path, then take a slight left
- At the end of the eastern passage, use the rope to climb onto an overhead platform
- Next, take a few steps west and use the grapple point to clear the gap 
- From the other side, go north and climb wall to your left towards the patate
- Finally, mantle over the short wall, and with a running start, leap onto the column to reach and speak to the patate

**Rewards:**
- Sakapatate (Lune outfit)

title: Ono-Puncho
description:
**How to Begin:** Find and speak to the purple Gestral inside the [Gestral Village](/?locationId=448439)  

**Quest Steps:**
- Agree to the challenge of hitting Ono-Puncho with a single attack dealing 9,999 damage 

**Rewards:**
- Sakapatate (Maelle outfit)

title: Hexga (Nevron)
description:
**How to Begin:** Start at the Old Farm rest point flag found inside the [Stone Wave Cliffs](/?locationId=448434), then head south and take a slight right as you approach the wall to follow the lantern-lined path.  When you reach the top of the hill, take a left, then use the handholds on the right wall to climb toward the Hexga

**Quest Steps:**
- Enter the nearby cave, use the grapple point to cross the gap, then head east and descend the rope to the lower level
- Find all three glowing rock crystals in the large underground area:
  - [Glowing Rock Crystal I](/?locationId=458546)
  - [Glowing Rock Crystal II](/?locationId=458547)
  - [Glowing Rock Crystal III](/?locationId=458548)
- Return to the Hexga and give them the rocks
- Retrieve your reward from where the Hexga was sitting 

**Rewards:**
- [Auto Shell](/?locationId=454681) (Pictos)
- Colour of Lumina x3 (Must kill Hexga)
- Polished Chroma Catalyst (Must kill Hexga)
- Recoat (Must kill Hexga)

title: Benisseur (Nevron)
description:
**How to Begin:** Head south, once inside the [Red Woods](/?locationId=448579), and speak with the talking fountain  

**Quest Steps:**
- You'll need to pay the talking fountain four times in the increments listed below:
  - Payment 1 - 5,000 Chroma
  - Payment 2 - 10,000 Chroma
  - Payment 3 - 25,000 Chroma
  - Payment 4 - 50,000 Chroma
- After all four payments (a total of 90,000 Chroma), the Benisseur will pop up and present your reward 

**Rewards:**
- [Recovery](/?locationId=452891) (Pictos)
- Grandiose Chroma Catalyst (Must kill Benisseur)

title: Troubadour (Nevron)
description:
**How to Begin:** Head south, once inside the [Stone Quarry](/?locationId=448478), and speak with the Troubadour   

**Quest Steps:**
- Survive three rounds of Troubadour's playing without getting hit by a red orb, even once. 
- Allow the green orbs to hit you for a small bit of healing 
- In each subsequent round, the Troubadour's playing will get slightly quicker, so it's essential to focus on the end of the Nevron's trumpet to quickly identify whether you need to parry/dodge or let the orb hit you
- Speak with Troubadour again after completing all 3 rounds for your reward 

**Rewards:**
- [Healing Parry](/?locationId=448556) (Pictos)
- Resplendent Chroma Catalyst (Must kill Troubadour)

title: Portier (Nevron)
description:
**How to Begin:** Speak with the floating blue orb, found within the [Esoteric Ruins](/?locationId=448459) and agree to help the spirit retrieve the item from within the Esoteric Ruins Maze.  

**Quest Steps:**
1. Climb up the handholds on the northwestern wall, then use the rope to reach the top of the cliff. Walk down the hillside and head northwest to find the Esoteric Ruins Maze entrance
2. Shoot the glowing orb above the brazier near the entrance. This should open paths leading both left and right.
3. Next, walk into the room on your left.
4. Turn around to shoot the first glowing brazier again. At this point, both doorways should be blocked.
5. Shoot the glowing brazier in your current room to open the path west.
6. Walk west into the next room, take a right, and head to the other side of the maze to the far right room.
7. Once in the far right room, turn around and shoot the central brazier.
8. Finally, walk through the open doorway, take a left, then turn right to exit the maze, completing the Esoteric Ruins Maze puzzle!
9. Explore the area beyond the maze to collect several purple-colored items, including [Wood Boards](/?locationId=449744) found on the slanted rooftop at the center of the area
10. Return to the spirit and give them the [Wood Boards](/?locationId=449744) for your reward

**Note:**  There are several ways to complete the Esoteric Ruins Maze - when you shoot a brazier, pay attention to the glowing contrails that indicate which areas are being opened or blocked by your shots.

**Rewards:**
- [Protecting Heal](/?locationId=456534) (Pictos)
- Colour of Lumina x3 (Must kill Portier)
- Polished Chroma Catalyst (Must kill Portier)

title: Danseuse Teacher (Nevron)
description:
**How to Begin:** After entering [Frozen Hearts](/?locationId=448496), walk north of the Icebound Train Station Rest Point, and through the northwestern path left of the train. Next, go left to enter a cave and climb the rope.  On the upper level, turn left to travel southeast, then walk up the short staircase. Finally, follow the train tracks north, then drop down and speak with the Danseuse Teacher.

**Quest Steps:**
- Progress dialogue with the Teacher until you can select "Okay... I'm ready" to begin the challenge
- You must parry ALL incoming projectiles to perform a counterattack
- Speak with the Danseuse Teacher again after accomplishing this for your reward 

**Rewards:**
- Danseuse (Lune outfit)
- [Augmented Counter III](/?locationId=456360) (Pictos) (Must kill Danseuse Teacher)
- Grandiose Chroma Catalyst x3 (Must kill Danseuse Teacher)
- Recoat (Must kill Danseuse Teacher)

title: Chalier (Nevron)
description:
**How to Begin:** After accessing the [Floating Cemetery](/?locationId=448522), head northwest from the Entrance Rest Point to speak with the Chalier standing in front of a massive pile of corpses  

**Quest Steps:**
- The Nevron asks you to choose a weapon for them to fight you with 
- Defeat the Chalier in battle and collect your reward

**Rewards:**
- [Longer Shell](/?locationId=455110) (Pictos)
- [Auto Powerful](/?locationId=450907) (Pictos) (Must kill Chalier)

title: Blanche
description:
**Prerequisite:** For the best possible rewards - make sure to complete all Friendly Nevron quests and be sure NOT to kill any of them before speaking with Blanche:
- [Jar (Nevron)](/?locationId=457667)

- [Chalier (Nevron)](/?locationId=457681)

**Quest Steps:**
- Successfully completing all prerequisites will grant you the reward below, else
- If the prerequisites are incomplete, [Blanche will become hostile and attack](/?locationId=454584) 

**Rewards:**
- Colour of Lumina x100

title: Grandis Fashionist
description:
**Location:** Found within [Monoco's Station](/?locationId=448427) wearing a red beret.  Answer his questions correctly with each of the three women and he'll reward the Pure Outfit to each:
- Lune: 
  - Life blooms like a rose, with petals soft and frail... -> Winter winds will whisper, the ending of the tale.
  - Life's a canvas painted with the colours of our strife... -> Death the artist's final stroke, completing every life.
  - Life sings a song of joy and pain, its notes both sweet and bitter... -> Its echoes fade to stillness, our secrets follow after.
- Maelle:
  - Life is but a fleeting dream, a whisper in the night... -> While shadows fade to silence, gone beyond our sight.
  - Through the veil of shadows, life's mysteries are spun... -> Death untangles threads, revealing what's begun.  
  - Life dances on the edge of time, a flicker in the breeze... -> Eternity then cradles us, a promise to appease.
- Sciel:
  - Life's a river winding through the valleys of despair... -> It meets the sea's embrace, where sorrow turns to air.
  - Life's a story written with the ink of dreams and fears... -> And death the final chapter, where we shed our tears.
  - Life's a blazing comet, racing through the sky... -> Its light will softly fade, where weary skies lie.
